text:
Chelo Alonso (10 April 1933 – 20 February 2019) was a Cuban-born Italian actress. She was born in Camagüey, Cuba. Alonso was known for her roles in "Goliath and the Barbarians", "Morgan the Pirate" and in "Run, Man, Run".
Alonso died on February 20, 2019 in Mentana, Italy from complications of Parkinson's disease at the age of 85.
